page.title: 05Blandford's Schools
page.content: We talked to the 6 headteachers of Blandford schools. Some told us that learning to live together and deal with people are the most important, others said English & Maths are most important & one said each subject is as important as another.Milldown First School have a concrete model of a Somerset & Dorset engine to play on. This term their annual count on the school field lists 94 plant types in flower.We at Archbishop Wake First surveyed for Domesday 1986!In all 2020 children & 116 teachers work in our schools;the Upper School has 729 students aged 13-18.The purpose built St.Leonards Middle School opened in 1980.At Milldown Middle School we saw ducks,geese,hens,goats & shorn Jacobs Sheep.They use the fleece when they learn to spin.Most schools have lunch- time clubs and activities.
